meanings.definition: The quality or state of being longheaded.
meanings.sent1: Her longheadednesses helped her make wise decisions.
meanings.sent2: His longheadednesses in planning for the future saved him from many troubles.
meanings.sent3: Despite his longheadednesses, he still managed to forget his keys every morning.
meanings.sent4: Her longheadednesses were like a lighthouse guiding her through life's storms.
meanings.sent5: The longheadednesses of the old owl made it the wisest bird in the forest.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of having foresight or being able to anticipate future events.
meanings.sent1: The king's longheadednesses allowed him to prepare for any threat to his kingdom.
meanings.sent2: Her longheadednesses in investing early made her a wealthy businesswoman.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel's longheadednesses in storing nuts for winter were admired by all the forest animals.
meanings.sent4: His longheadednesses were like a crystal ball, always seeing what was to come.
meanings.sent5: The longheadednesses of the weather forecaster saved many picnics from being rained out.
